B

Binary - Class in <Unnamed>
Methods for converting between binary and decimal.
Binary() - Constructor for class Binary
 
BINARY_LENGTH - Static variable in class Binary
Class constant defines the length of binary numbers.
binToSDec(boolean[]) - Static method in class Binary
Converts a two's complement binary nubmer to signed decimal
binToUDec(boolean[]) - Static method in class Binary
Converts an unsigned binary nubmer to unsigned decimal

C

Constructor for a line of cache.
CacheSet - Class in <Unnamed>
Simulates one set of cache lines.

Constructor creates a set of CacheLine objects.

G

Returns a copy of the data bits.

Returns the value of the last used data member.

getSize() - Method in class MainMemory
Returns the size of this memory unit in Bytes.
getTag() - Method in class CacheLine
Returns a copy of the tag bits.

I

isDirty() - Method in class CacheLine
Returns true if the line contains dirty data; false otherwise.
isValid() - Method in class CacheLine
Returns true if the line contains valid data; false otherwise.

M

Creates an instruction memory object and initializes the memory to data input from a file.
